name: Lizz's Story
description:
A tiny lil clicker game by Paz and Manny Mallea.

It's Lizz! The hip new pet sweeping the nation! As the owner of your very own lizz, help it grow by feeding it Yummz, keeping it warm, and tossing all sorts of toys in its cage. Absolutely nothing can go wrong, right? Wᴀʀɴɪɴɢ: ɴᴏᴛ ʟɪᴀʙʟᴇ ғᴏʀ ᴀɴʏ ᴅᴀᴍᴀɢᴇs ᴄᴀᴜsᴇᴅ ʙʏ ʏᴏᴜʀ ʟɪᴢᴢ, sᴜᴄʜ ᴀs ʙʀᴏᴋᴇɴ ᴄᴀɢᴇs, sᴡᴀʟʟᴏᴡᴇᴅ ᴘᴇᴛs, ᴇᴀᴛᴇɴ ɴᴇɪɢʜʙᴏʀs, ᴅᴇsᴛʀᴏʏᴇᴅ ʜᴏᴍᴇs, ᴇᴛᴄ. Yᴏᴜ ʜᴀᴠᴇ ʙᴇᴇɴ ᴡᴀʀɴᴇᴅ.

This game was built as part of the Tiny Mass Games collective. TMG focuses on polished short-form games on two-month timelines. Play more Tiny Mass at https://tinymassgames.itch.io/

Press? Streamer? Check this out! Press / Streamer Kit
